name: Startup
description: All about the initial step of getting a business off the ground! How to get ideas, test ideas, and grab a foothold in the marketplace.

name: Entrepreneurship
description: Owning and managing your own business. Lessons on topics from responsibilities to growing your team to lifestyle.

name: Marketing
description: Growing and scaling in your industry. Digital, social, word-of-mouth... whatever it takes!

name: Building Your Website
description: All about the website building process. What do you need for your online presence?
